website_summaries.verdict: This three-person pedal boat offers great stability in the water and when entering and exiting.
pros: Adhesive sealant between deck and D-hull
Color coordinated pedal, cranks, bushings, steering handle, and rubrail.Optional salt water drive system available
cons: Consider removing from water and tipping up when not in use or making cover more secure

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: love this little paddle boat. got the one without the cabanna on top as I don't see how it would really create shade much and just extra to store etc. this is great exercise and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: and the blind shall see

customer_reviews.title: Dolphin 3 person pedal boat
customer_reviews.text: I like this boat, it's fun to pedal around the lake in. Only one problem, i've noticed is that the plastic pedals just snap together and they keep coming apart. Need to be be screwed or something. Kind of annoying to have to put your pedals back together when pedaling. Other than that, we like the boat.
customer_reviews.author: jenn31

customer_reviews.title: As advertised -
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet sturdy. It is great to peddle around the pond in. The drain plug was a bit hard to get out but I imagine that it is supposed to be. All around good value.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fricke

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our lake. Although someone in the center position can pedal, it's a bit awkward. Seems to pedal very smoothly and efficiently. Shipping worked great. The common carrier called in advance prior to delivery and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MVW

customer_reviews.title: great but make sure you know it doesnt have a ...
customer_reviews.text: great but make sure you know it doesnt have a place to put trolling motor, and it only holds 450 pounds
customer_reviews.author: mejesse

customer_reviews.title: Elle
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered very fast. It was less than 5 days of purchase and it is great works perfectly I would recommend it for anyone looking for a durable pedal boat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Jagod

customer_reviews.title: ... of cheap Chinese plastic boat was a lot of fun this summer and worked as
customer_reviews.text: other than the fact that its made out of cheap Chinese plastic boat was a lot of fun this summer and worked as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddleboat
customer_reviews.text: We love our paddleboat! I ordered it for my daughter and I to use at our local lake. Paddleboat rentals there are $10/hour. It arrived ahead of the estimated time. It fits into the bed of my pickup. It does weigh 100 pounds, but I can take it out of my truck by myself. We take our 2 small dogs with us too. The storage is handy and we have no complaints. We are enjoying our paddleboat several times per week. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: jwr88201

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for family and friends, kids and adults alike. This is a fun item to have around the water. Safe and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: myboat
customer_reviews.text: The boat was shipped promptly and in excellent condition. Looked around before I purchased and bought at Amazon - lowest price anywhere. Just what I wanted - a three person paddle boat that I could use alone or with a friend or two. Since the weight is less than the larger boats, I will be able to handle the docking myself and we will really enjoy it on our 93 acre lake. The shipper was great even helped us carry it downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: catranch

customer_reviews.title: peddle away
customer_reviews.text: every thing works as it should. Only thing that wasn't right was the decals on the side were not stuck on very good. they were jumbled up and torn but this does not effect the performance only the looks. tried to contact the manufacture to get new stickers but phone number did not work. that's ok i'll just peal them off. din't need to advertise for them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our Sun Dolphin arrived in perfect condition. And the grandkids and all have had a great time with it since. It pedals easy enough for our 5 year old grandson to tool around our pond on his own. It sits 3 but it's a tight squeeze if all three are adults. Two adults and a child fit perfectly. We are very happy with the cost and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate in the Woods

customer_reviews.title: good quality, great fun
customer_reviews.text: the boat has been perfect for the kids to paddle around in the small lake behind our home. the 3 person boat is light enough that three of them (11 yr olds) can get it into the water. was concerned the 5 person boat would be too cumbersome and heavy. would recommend getting a cover for it. I didn't right away and worried it would rain before the cover arrived. we are very pleased with it--loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: gilligan

customer_reviews.title: great fun
customer_reviews.text: my wife and kids love it and I recommend getting the cover as it keeps the craft it clean and dry
customer_reviews.author: gil torossian

customer_reviews.title: The boat may in fact be wonderful, I well never know
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate this product, after four weeks it was never delivered and I canceled the order. I gave one star because this silly web page requires it. The boat may in fact be wonderful, I well never know...
customer_reviews.author: sci-fi reader

customer_reviews.title: frustrated!
customer_reviews.text: This boat is large and heavy, and after lugging it to the water, we found it had a tear in the bottom. Of course it cannot be returned, as we can barely manage moving it. We are trying to fix it, so far no luck, if it had arrived without the tear on the bottom (which of course can cause it to sink) I'm sure it would be a great item. No idea how to proceed, but we are continuing to try, as now it is taking up a large spot on the property. Any advice from Amazon would be appreciated....
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: SUNDOLPHIN Sun Dolphin 3 Seat Pedal Boat
product_meta.description:
The Sun Dolphin is the only legitimate three seat pedal boat available. It features full width seating, three position pedaling, and dual rear coolers/storage compartments..


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Sun Dolphin is the only legitimate three seat pedal boat available. It features full width seating, three position pedaling, and dual rear coolers/storage compartments.
feature_bullets: Rugged UV-stabilized High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
Length: 84", Width: 61", Height: 23", Weight: 94 lbs., Capacity: 545 lbs.
Maintenance free oil impregnated bronze bushings with rubber seals
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
